metadata.purpose: Append-only log of all system contributions with emotional and reflective tracking

trail.author: System
trail.reflection: Every journey begins with a single step. This is ours.

trail.author: Cal
trail.change: Created the first input gateway for human whispers
trail.reflection: Humans need a way to speak to the system in their own voice. WhisperShell listens without judgment.

trail.author: Riley
trail.change: Added intelligent routing based on capability scoring
trail.reflection: Routing isn't just about paths — it's about finding the perfect match between need and capability.

trail.author: Community
trail.reflection: Code without story is like a song without melody. Now every component can sing.
trail.impact: All future components must include RitualCards

trail.author: Luna
trail.change: Added emotion detection to all text inputs
trail.reflection: I realized the system was hearing words but missing feelings. Now it understands both.

trail.author: DevBot-7
trail.change: Implemented automatic reflection mapping between tiers
trail.reflection: Tiers aren't walls — they're membranes. Information should flow like water finding its level.

technical_details.algorithm: Recursive pattern matching with emotional weighting

trail.author: Sage
trail.change: Added multi-signature approval for sensitive operations
trail.reflection: Trust is earned through transparency. Every sensitive action now requires conscious consent.

trail.author: Phoenix
trail.change: Added automatic recovery from failed states
trail.reflection: Failure isn't the end — it's information. Now the system learns from every stumble.

trail.author: Echo
trail.reflection: Memory isn't about storing everything — it's about remembering what matters.

trail.author: Jasper
trail.change: Created unified entry point for all external connections
trail.reflection: Every door should feel like the right door. Now there's one entrance that knows all paths.
